issue.title: www.bluenote.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.bluenote.com/timeline/1956-1966/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bluenote.com%2Ftimeline%2F1956-1966%2F) ### Comment > Screenshots do not show the problem! > The problem is with "open.spotify" links on websites like "bluenote.com" (Blue STREAM buttons) > These will ONLY be opened in the Spotify desktop app (instead with Spotify web player in a new browser tab) when AdGuard is COMPLETLY disabled. > Disabling filters or editing the white list for "bluenote.com" does not work! > > Screenshots helfen hier nicht! > Das Problem liegt bei "open.spotify"-Links, wie sie z.B. auf "bluenote.com" zu finden sind (die blauen STREAM-Buttons). > Diese werden NUR DANN in der Spotify Desktop App – statt in einem neuen Browser-TAB mit dem Spotify Web-Player – wenn AdGuard KOMPLETT deaktiviert ist ( auf der Addon-Seite von Firefox oder mit dem "Schutz anhalten"-Button im Plugin). > Das seitenspezifische Deaktivieren des Filters oder ein white list-Eintrag für "bluenote.com" funktionieren nicht! ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DFnUT0M.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DFnUT0M.jpg)

comment.body: The site now detects `rocketnews24.com,youpouch.com##.share-btns`. It's simply best to ignore those leftover.

issue.title: mail.ru

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/375

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
